trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for creating expression classes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> class.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance of the owner control.
The HTTP context instance of the owner control.
Gets the data source object that is associated with the owner control.
The data source object that is associated with the owner control.
Evaluates the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> instance using the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> interface.
The <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that the expression is added to.
An instance of <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that was used to evaluate the data source expression.
Gets a value that indicates whether a data source expression object is tracking its view state changes.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source expression object is tracking its view state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Loads the state of the values in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object that must be persisted.
An object that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
Gets the owner control.
The owner control.
Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
An object that contains the saved state of the data source expression.

Sets the HTTP context of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object that uses the specified owner control, <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.IQueryableDataSource"></xref> object.
The owner control of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
The data context to use.
The <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object to use.
Marks the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object so that its state will be saved in view state.
When implemented by a class, gets a value that indicates whether a data source expression object is tracking its view state changes.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a data source expression object is tracking its view state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
When implemented by a class, loads the previously saved view state of the data source expression object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
The object that represents the saved view state values for the data source expression object.
When implemented by a class, saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
The object that contains the view state changes.

When implemented by a class, tracks view state changes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object so that the changes can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object for the data source expression object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.

Tracks view state changes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.DataSourceExpression"></xref> object so that the changes can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object for the data source expression object.
Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> class that contains the current view state information.
An instance of the state bag object that contains the current view state information.
